name: Shadow dungeon (DirtLandStudio)
description:
This is a school project. It is a 2D platforming rogue-like with pixel art assets.

made in the GODOT engine

controls:

arrows to move

shift to run

esc to pause and see menu

Thanks to:

https://rvros.itch.io/ - player sprite

Lætitia - Music

Anaïs - Music

GDQuest - inspiration for the level generator
